body_html:
I solved my issue. I just installed CUDA 9.0 to a different directory.

And before i import tensorflow i make sure to set my PATH to add cuda 9.0. After doing that i get no error when i run tensorflow gpu
body_text:
I solved my issue. I just installed CUDA 9.0 to a different directory.
And before i import tensorflow i make sure to set my PATH to add cuda 9.0. After doing that i get no error when i run tensorflow gpu
body:
I solved my issue. I just installed CUDA 9.0 to a different directory. 

And before i import tensorflow i make sure to set my PATH to add cuda 9.0. After doing that i get no error when i run tensorflow gpu
